skillTree.localised_description: Fit, hardy, and raised on a diet of grains and human blood, this beast can outrun its Old World counterparts.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can fire while on the move.
This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.
This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
If this unit can hide at its current location it will not be spotted until the enemy is very close.

skillTree.localised_description: This one is capable of hiding in almost any environment, rising like a ghost to deliver death.
Treason is never straightforward, especially when your every move is watched and reported.

effects.description:
On turn start, Lords have a chance to gain 2 loyalty
	(accompanying Lord)

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: When a bomb is smashed, a dark smoke curls out, concealing those who wish to hide and choking everyone else.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
If this unit can hide at its current location it will not be spotted until the enemy is very close.

skillTree.localised_description: Having grown up climbing the rocky crags of the Eastern Steppes, this assassin can easily scale a castle wall.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.

skillTree.localised_description: This assassin is a foreigner in the employ of the khan and is knowledgeable about the streets and defences of towns and cities.

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: +5 with Warriors of Chaos
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.localised_description: This one silently follows the khan wherever he goes, protecting the warlord from other assassins.

effects.description:
Enemy Hero action success chance: -15%
	(all characters factionwide)

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: So much of war is an art. Over time and with much practice, combat moves can resemble a series of perfectly-rehearsed dance moves.
This being fights dirty, no honour system applies here!
"Stay in one place, gods-damn you!"
Whether a targeted slice to the throat, or a precision stab to the heart, this one knows how to kill!
"The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud – these are the things that sustain me."
Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.
Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife in…
The harder they hit, the more they commit, the easier it is to strike back.
A drawn blade should not be put away until slaked in blood.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: You have to get up very early if you want to beat this one; nothing escapes their keen eye and lightning reflexes.
The forest teaches a warrior not only when to fire but where, which makes a bigger difference.
Although precision in missile combat is something that can be learned, this one was born with a high degree of natural talent.
A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.localised_description: Compared to slaying an enemy general or king, it is a simple thing to make some prized valuables disappear.

effects.description: Steal Valuables action: Additional 3% success chance
Steal Valuables action: Additional 8% success chance
Steal Valuables action: Additional 15% success chance

skillTree.localised_description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: "I am not here to inspire, I am here to kill - come let us draw blades together!"

effects.description: Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 3%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 8%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Agent Actions [HIDDEN]
Behind every thought they have - and every deed - is shameless, full-blooded spite.
"Some folk call me vicious. I'll scoop out the eyes of any who utter it in my presence."
To cause another's suffering, to delight in their pain, to extend their agony according to your whim. That is power.
This one delights in galloping across the steppes, feeling the cold wind in their face and the thunder of hooves beneath them.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This leader has an eye for fine horseflesh, able to discern the best studs and mares from which to breed a herd.

effects.description:
Attribute: Glorious Charge for Feral Horse Herd
	(all units in army)

related_attributes.bullet_text:
When charging into an enemy unit:
	  Charge Bonus duration is doubled.
	 Enemy units take a  Leadership penalty as if they have been attacked in the flank.

effects.description:
Passive ability: "Sturdy Steeds" for Feral Horse Herd
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "Begone! I have no need for your gifts of airag and wine... In fact, perhaps I'd be better off without you altogether..."
"The Great Wolf howls amidst the thunder, his red lightning guiding my blade to fresh blood."

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "See this dung pile? Can you not see the Great Vulture's wisdom contained within?"

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases as the unit takes damage

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "The Great Eagle soars over all, spying out new pastures for the herds to roam."

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with Winds of Magic spent on the battlefield

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "The Great Serpent tells me of great riches to the south, just waiting to be taken."

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases by each enemy unit in range with leadership wavering or lower.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This one comes from the strange community of hunters that feast upon warped mutant flesh. This diet has had...unusual results.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
Entities with this attribute ignore the effects of enemy contact effects such as  Poison

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This one likes to hunt using the raptors native to the cliffs and crags of the Eastern Steppes.

effects.description:
Bonus vs. Large: +5 for Chaos Vultures
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This nomad is curious about the discoveries and innovations of foreign lands, and how to use them for war.
This one is an expert in the saddle, guiding their steed to such speeds that horse and rider seem to fly.

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: -20%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This one has won countless bouts in the circle, proving themselves a champion of the tribes.
Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +25%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

effects.description: Magic item drop chance from battle: +15%

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
Well built, robust. Powerful.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description: Reinforcements supporting this army can have their arrival point adjusted by +500 metres without incurring any time penalty

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This one can fire an arrow accurately from incredible distances, from a shaking saddle, or in the worst weather conditions.
